info.description:
Purpose
~~~~~~~

CAD-2-SIM is a tool for transferring mechanisms from Computer Aided Design to Simulation software. 
The modeling is based on the Sheth-Uicker Convention. 


Installation
~~~~~~~~~~~~

For a description of the installation rountine, see the user guide. 

  
Further Information
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

For more information, check out the documentation folder.
